rooms.room_name: entrance hall and living room area
rooms.description: Open space serving as the entry point with a reception area leading to the living room that adheres to Vastu by placing it in the southern direction.
Traditional Kerala-style kitchen with a central dining area. Placed in the east following Vastu guidelines to promote energy and prosperity.
Spacious master bedroom featuring a dedicated balcony for natural light and proper air flow as per Vastu principles. South-west placement is preferred.
Guest bedroom located in the north-east with its own balcony to ensure balance according to local architectural norms.
Dedicated home office space designed for productivity. Placed in the west following Vastu guidelines for career growth and concentration.
Second bedroom with a dedicated balcony to ensure proper ventilation. Placed in the north following local design norms.
Bathroom attached to additional bedroom for privacy and ease of use.
Shared bathroom facilities with a traditional Kerala-style design.
